description: n read modulo (number of divisors of n).
comments: a(n)=0 iff n is a refactorable number (cf. A033950). - _Franz Vrabec_, Oct 16 2005a(n) = A049850(n) mod A000005(n). - _Jaroslav Krizek_, Nov 27 2013a(A066708(n)) = n and a(m) < n for m < A066708(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 17 2014
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a054008 n = n `mod` a000005 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 17 2014
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu) Jan 12, 2000
